Text: The street release date is October 2, 2012, so a BIG thanks for this upload this early and especially for such a classic Disney Masterpiece. However, the Pocahontas Two-Movie Special Edition Blu-ray had a street release date of August 21st 2012 which was two days ago! I though we would have gotten that early but now it's seems its gonna be late. I know us pirates are spoiled but any idea when Pocahontas 1080p is comin out?
